hero_title: Transform your professional image in minutes, not hours.
hero_subtitle: Create flawless studio portraits with our AI. Upload your photos, choose your style, and get results that make you stand out.
feature_control_description: Control every detail of your image. Choose from hundreds of styles, define the lighting, perfect the pose, and select the wardrobe. Your personal art director is an artificial intelligence.
feature_versatility_title: A Month of Content in a Day.
feature_versatility_description: Generate dozens of unique portraits for each of your platforms. Get professional images for LinkedIn, casual looks for Instagram, and headshots for your portfolio, all in a single session.
feature_realism_description: Every detail counts. Textures, lighting, and image quality that surpasses reality. Our AI is trained by professional photographers to ensure flawless results.
style_cinematic_description: Dramatic lighting and deep colors for a movie-like look.
style_corporate_description: Clean lines and a professional look for your LinkedIn profile or company website.
style_avant_garde_description: Explore your most creative side with unique and bold styles.
process_step1_description: The first step is the most important. We need a good selection of your photos for the AI to learn your features. Upload between 10 and 20 clear images, with good lighting and from different angles. Avoid sunglasses, hats, or anything that covers your face.
process_step2_description: Browse our style gallery and choose the ones that best fit your personal brand. You can combine different types of clothing, backgrounds, and ambiances.
process_step3_description: In 24-48 hours, you will receive a pack of high-resolution professional portraits, ready to use on all your platforms.
urgency_description: Only 10 spots left with a 50% discount for the first 100 customers.
pricing_subtitle: Choose the plan that best suits your needs and start creating today.
testimonial1_quote: Incredible! I got a full portfolio in days, something that would have taken me months and thousands of euros. The quality is spectacular.
testimonial2_quote: As an actor, I constantly need headshots. This service has saved me a fortune and gives me the variety I need for every casting.
testimonial3_quote: Privacy was key for me. The process was super discreet and the results exceeded my expectations. Totally recommended!
quiz_title: What kind of image do you need?
quiz_subtitle: Answer a few questions to find your ideal package.
quiz_step1_question: Step 1: What is your main profession?
quiz_step2_question: Step 2: What will you use the images for?
quiz_step3_question: Step 3: How much style variety do you need?
